channel.title: +1 Forward - Teens With Attitude
channel.description:
Rach and Rich interview David Brunell-Brutman about his game about 1990's action with *Teens with Attitude*.
**Timecodes:** 0:01:46 - Read a Sitch about what it means to Play to Find Out 0:13:19 - Open Your Brain to *Teens With Attitude* 0:23:33 - Act Under Fire with Chris and Lance
Find the *Teens With Attitude* Quickstart here: [teenswithattitude.com](http://teenswithattitude.com/) David's Patreon: [patreon.com/davidbrunellbrutman](http://patreon.com/davidbrunellbrutman) David's Instagram: [instagram.com/david.brunellbrutman](http://instagram.com/david.brunellbrutman)
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/teens-with-attitude
